mapper.select: SELECT payment_id, member_id, order_id, claim_id, amount, payment_method, pg_company, status, transaction_id, payment_date FROM payment
SELECT payment_id, member_id, order_id, claim_id, amount, payment_method, pg_company, status, transaction_id, payment_date FROM payment WHERE payment_id = #{paymentId}
SELECT payment_id, member_id, order_id, claim_id, amount, payment_method, pg_company, status, transaction_id, payment_date FROM payment WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (payment_id, member_id, order_id, claim_id, amount, payment_method, pg_company, status, transaction_id, payment_date) VALUES (#{paymentId}, #{memberId}, #{orderId}, #{claimId}, #{amount}, #{paymentMethod}, #{pgCompany}, #{status}, #{transactionId}, #{paymentDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE payment SET member_id = #{memberId}, order_id = #{orderId}, claim_id = #{claimId}, amount = #{amount}, payment_method = #{paymentMethod}, pg_company = #{pgCompany}, status = #{status}, transaction_id = #{transactionId}, payment_date = #{paymentDate} WHERE payment_id = #{paymentId}
